cliTools.name: kubectl
cliTools.markdownDescription: A command line tool used to run commands against Kubernetes clusters. It does this by authenticating with the Master Node of your cluster and making API calls to do a variety of management actions. If you're just getting started with Kubernetes, prepare to be spending a lot of time with kubectl
